description: AKS Engine is an ARM template-driven way to provision a self-managed Kubernetes cluster on Azure Stack Hub. By leveraging ARM (Azure Resource Manager), AKS Engine helps you create, destroy and maintain clusters provisioned with basic IaaS resources in Azure Stack Hub.
summary: aks-engine-azurestack is a CLI tool. It provides functionality to create and maintain a Kubernetes cluster on Azure Stack Hub.
author: Microsoft AKS Engine Azure Stack is supported by and built with a community of developers
